name: EPHEMERAL -FANTASY ON DARK-
description:
Dark Fantasy X Campus Love Adventure coming to Nintendo Switch™ with full voice acting and switchable language (English, Japanese, German and French)!!
A forbidden campus love story across races, between Cloé and the other Residents of the Dark.

<STORY>
Our heroine, Cloé, was born and raised in a caged town behind tall fences.

All of the residents of this town are zombies, like Cloé.

Daily life in this town is peaceful… Apart from the many suicides.

Cloé has always wished to learn more about the outside world, and one day... Cloé receives an admission notice for a prestigious school, only enrolled by the elites of various races.

Werewolf, Invisible man, Vampire, Mummy...
Enjoy a hierarchical school life with these charming residents of the dark!
In this school, Cloé learns of the forbidden love across racial barrier…

Contents only possible on Nintendo Switch!
・Full voice acting by a stellar cast of voice actors!
The exciting campus life with the charming Residents of the Dark will be spiced up by the voices of Takashi Kondo, Shun Horie, Kazuyuki Okitsu and Toyonaga Toshiyuki.

・Easy navigations with Nintendo Switch!
With the ease of accessibility on the touch panel, it's easier now to enjoy the game with the Quick Load and Quick Save system.

・Switchable language!
Text language are available in French, German, English, and Japanese.

*This game is a romance visual novel game.
